name: Nimbus AI
description: Smart, Decentralized, Intelligent Messaging Nimbus combines decentralized messaging, local AI processing, and user-owned encryption keys to deliver unmatched privacy, control, and intelligent features. Experience messaging that is truly yours—secure, private, and smarter. Secure Messaging: Your Keys, Your Messages. Own your conversations with end-to-end encryption and decentralized messaging. Your data stays private, under your control, and accessible only to you—no servers, no compromises. AI-Powered Enhancements: SMART MESSAGING, POWERED LOCALLY Get smart replies, real-time translations, and AI-driven suggestions—all processed on your device, ensuring your data stays yours. Privacy-First Uncompromising Privacy TOTAL PRIVACY, BUILT-IN End-to-end encryption ensures your conversations are secure, while local AI processing guarantees zero data exposure.
